Yan(Helen) Yan
Principal Business Analyst at EDF Trading
February 8, 2011, Yan(Helen) worked with Alex in the same group

Yan is one of my all-time favorite coworkers, and I highly recommend her.I have worked with her since she started with us, and from the beginning she was asking the right kinds of questions, reading a lot of documentation and writing great requirements.  She is very versatile, working with our design firm at one point in the project to assist with every detail in designing several features, contributing to internal review sessions, and the implementing the features with onshore and offshore development groups.  I totally trust her because I know she is highly invested in her work, it shows with her attention to detail and her understanding of what she is doing.  I have seen other BA's who don't get that engaged, but just do what they think they are supposed to do, without really understanding the point of what they are doing, which leads to software that doesn't make sense.  I know what a big difference her engagement makes. I was able to hand off work that I started and Yan was able to catch my mistakes and to have it implemented perfectly.When Yan's contract is up, we won't need to redo anything, and we will have requirements ready to go that we won't need to rewrite, we will just be able to implement them. We'll be able to focus on missing her, she's that good.

Alex James
Senior Software Engineer at Wayne, A GE Energy Business
January 21, 2011, Alex worked with Alex in different groups

Alex is an extremely driven software engineer.  He has a lot of enthusiasm for what he does, and has contributed a lot to our project.  I have worked with him implementing some UI elements, some vendor integration and also on some very complex performance issues. He did a great job in all those areas.  He is very thorough, met all my requirements, and is a joy to work with.  Alex is very collaborative too, makes great suggestions and finds creative solutions when forced to compromise.  I recommend him and hope to work with him again in the future.
